name: Rainforest Rachel
description:
This is test build v0.5
I've spent less than 20 hours
on this game. I will be submitting this
to the ProcJam game jam, as well as working
on it for full release in the next 3 months.

Arrow keys for movement and jumping, controller should
work as well. Space jumps too and you can also use WASD for
movement, not sure if W jumps though yet.

Thanks to Jerrtato for making the character sprite, and to Blank Canvas for making the bigger image of Rachel!
